articles.title: US In Crucial Talks With Taliban To Address Afghan Humanitarian Crisis - NDTV
articles.description: A group of senior American diplomats met representatives from the Taliban and technocratic professionals during which they discussed critical issues concerning Afghanistan's well-being and humanitarian crisis, the State Department said.
articles.content:
The interaction took place in Doha on July 30 and July 31.
